metadata.description: Google Drive links for lesson summaries

power_sharing.title: Power Sharing
power_sharing.topics_covered: Forms of power sharing, Belgian and Sri Lankan models, Why power sharing is desirable.

federalism.title: Federalism
federalism.topics_covered: What is federalism, What makes India a federal country, Decentralisation in India.

gender_religion_caste.title: Gender, Religion and Caste
gender_religion_caste.topics_covered: Gender and politics, Religion, communalism and politics, Caste and politics.

political_parties.title: Political Parties
political_parties.topics_covered: Why do we need political parties, National parties, State parties, Challenges to political parties.

outcomes_of_democracy.title: Outcomes of Democracy
outcomes_of_democracy.topics_covered: Accountable and legitimate government, Economic growth, Reduction of inequality, Dignity of the individual.

agriculture.title: Agriculture
agriculture.topics_covered: Types of farming, Cropping pattern, Major crops, Technological and institutional reforms.

resources_development.title: Resources and Development
resources_development.topics_covered: Types of resources, Development of resources, Land resources, Soil as a resource.

forest_wildlife.title: Forest and Wildlife Resources
forest_wildlife.topics_covered: Biodiversity, Conservation of forest and wildlife, Types and distribution of forests.

water_resources.title: Water Resources
water_resources.topics_covered: Water scarcity, Multi-purpose river projects, Rainwater harvesting.

minerals_energy.title: Minerals and Energy Resources
minerals_energy.topics_covered: What is a mineral, Ferrous and Non-Ferrous minerals, Conventional and Non-Conventional energy.

manufacturing_industries.title: Manufacturing Industries
manufacturing_industries.topics_covered: Importance of manufacturing, Agro-based industries, Mineral-based industries, Industrial pollution.

development.title: Development
development.topics_covered: What development promises, Income and other goals, National development, Sustainability.

sectors_indian_economy.title: Sectors of the Indian Economy
sectors_indian_economy.topics_covered: Primary, Secondary and Tertiary sectors, Division of sectors as organised and unorganised.

money_credit.title: Money and Credit
money_credit.topics_covered: Money as a medium of exchange, Loan activities of banks, Terms of credit, Self-Help Groups.

globalisation.title: Globalisation and the Indian Economy
globalisation.topics_covered: REVISED SYLLABUS FOCUS: What is Globalisation & Factors Enabling Globalisation.

rise_nationalism_europe.title: The Rise of Nationalism in Europe
rise_nationalism_europe.topics_covered: The French Revolution, The making of nationalism, The age of revolutions, Unification of Germany and Italy.

nationalism_india.title: Nationalism in India
nationalism_india.topics_covered: First World War, Khilafat and Non-Cooperation, Differing strands, Civil Disobedience.

print_culture.title: Print Culture and the Modern World
print_culture.topics_covered: The first printed books, Print comes to Europe, The print revolution, Print culture in India.

making_global_world.title: The Making of a Global World
making_global_world.topics_covered: Pre-Modern World to Conquest, Disease and Trade.
